A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Am I really going to write a review of this movie? Hasn't everyone (whether they've seen it or not) made up their mind?

I've read\, and seen\, a lot of valid criticism of this film. Simply from the point of being entertained\, this is not the direction I would have taken Star Wars.

Again\, from a view point of "entertainment"\, I found this movie to be terribly boring. I didn't care about any of the new\, or newer\, characters. Anything I might have been interested in was turned into a plot twist or used to "subvert my expectations". Ugh...
